attributes.title: Halo 3 Rap - "The Greatest Ever"
attributes.caption: The first JT Music video ever. Some would say it's the greatest ever? You decide...enjoy this Halo 3 Rap!
attributes.description: The first JT Music video ever. Some would say it's the greatest ever? You decide...enjoy this Halo 3 Rap!

attributes.title: Halo 3 Rap - "Halo 3 Rimz"
attributes.caption: Halo did so much for the FPS genre and it really tied vehicles in seamlessly. Thus, here is our rap in ode to Halo 3 vehicles!
attributes.description: Halo did so much for the FPS genre and it really tied vehicles in seamlessly. Thus, here is our rap in ode to Halo 3 vehicles!

attributes.title: Halo 3 Song Parody - "I Bagged a Noob"
attributes.caption: There's really no reason why this video should have ever been made. But we did. We mixed Halo 3 with Katy Perry.
attributes.description: There's really no reason why this video should have ever been made. But we did. We mixed Halo 3 with Katy Perry.
attributes.display_title: Halo 3 Song Parody - "I Bagged a Noob"

attributes.title: Halo 3 Song - "Noobz 4 Life"
attributes.caption: Our first recurring character and series of songs follows a whimsical Halo 3 Noob and his discovery of a video game.
attributes.description: Our first recurring character and series of songs follows a whimsical Halo 3 Noob and his discovery of a video game.

attributes.title: Halo 3 Rap - "This is JT Machinima"
attributes.caption: Our response video to a Halo diss track. Yeah that's right, those happened all those years ago too. Some things never change.
attributes.description: Our response video to a Halo diss track. Yeah that's right, those happened all those years ago too. Some things never change.

attributes.title: Halo 3 Song Parody - "Camper's Paradise"
attributes.caption: A parody of Coolio's "Gangsters Paradise". While still being a parody, we aimed to keep it faithful to the original song and music video. You be the judge.
attributes.description: A parody of Coolio's "Gangsters Paradise". While still being a parody, we aimed to keep it faithful to the original song and music video. You be the judge.

attributes.title: Halo 3 Rap - "The Dynasty"
attributes.caption: "The Dynasty" is a song about a particular made up Halo clan, but it's meant to represent all clans from Halo 3.
attributes.description: "The Dynasty" is a song about a particular made up Halo clan, but it's meant to represent all clans from Halo 3.

attributes.title: Halo 3 Song - "Oh, Hayabusa!"
attributes.caption: Hayabusa armor caused all sorts of fuss when people started acquiring it. We took our Halo 3 noob character and threw him into that situation.
attributes.description: Hayabusa armor caused all sorts of fuss when people started acquiring it. We took our Halo 3 noob character and threw him into that situation.

attributes.title: Halo ODST Rap
attributes.caption: Ever feel like you missed out on the story of Halo ODST or need a refresher? Watch this music video and you'll be all good.
attributes.description: Ever feel like you missed out on the story of Halo ODST or need a refresher? Watch this music video and you'll be all good.

attributes.title: Halo 3 Song - "I Wanna Bone You On Xbox Live"
attributes.caption: When a girl makes herself known in a game lobby things get weird. That's pretty much what happens with this goofy Halo 3 song.
attributes.description: When a girl makes herself known in a game lobby things get weird. That's pretty much what happens with this goofy Halo 3 song.
attributes.display_title: Halo 3 Song - "I Wanna Bone You On Xbox Live"

attributes.title: Halo Reach Rap - "The Greatest Ever 2"
attributes.caption: A "sequel" to the first music video we ever made, The Greatest Ever (duh). This time obviously with Halo Reach instead.
attributes.description: A "sequel" to the first music video we ever made, The Greatest Ever (duh). This time obviously with Halo Reach instead.

attributes.title: Halo Reach Song - "Ode 2 Noobs"
attributes.caption: Our Halo 3 noob graduates to Halo Reach and brings some friends along in this Halo Reach song.
attributes.description: Our Halo 3 noob graduates to Halo Reach and brings some friends along in this Halo Reach song.

attributes.title: Halo Reach Song Parody - "Straight Outta Bloodgulch"
attributes.caption: A parody of NWA's "Straight Outta Compton" based on Halo Reach.
attributes.description: A parody of NWA's "Straight Outta Compton" based on Halo Reach.
attributes.display_title: Halo Reach Song Parody - "Straight Outta Bloodgulch"

attributes.title: Halo Reach Song - "Teabag Hound"
attributes.caption: The Halo Noob returns for the last time and celebrates teabagging because why not.
attributes.description: The Halo Noob returns for the last time and celebrates teabagging because why not.

attributes.title: Halo 4 Rap - "The Reclaimer"
attributes.caption: With "The Reclaimer" we put the brakes on all the Halo Raps and decided to start doing one nerdcore anthem per new Halo release. We like this path better.
attributes.description: With "The Reclaimer" we put the brakes on all the Halo Raps and decided to start doing one nerdcore anthem per new Halo release. We like this path better.

attributes.title: Halo 3 Rap - "The Greatest Ever" Remake
attributes.caption: We remade our very first video, The Greatest Ever, five years later and the change in production quality is a fun comparison.
attributes.description: We remade our very first video, The Greatest Ever, five years later and the change in production quality is a fun comparison.

attributes.title: Halo 4 Rap Revisited - "The Reclaimer"
attributes.caption: This is the same exact thing as "The Reclaimer" but with female vocals for the chorus. Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: This is the same exact thing as "The Reclaimer" but with female vocals for the chorus. Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.

attributes.title: Halo Master Chief Collection Rap - "Back in the Ring"
attributes.caption: A rap with all the Halo games to date was just as much of a blast making as it was playing all those games throughout the years. If only the online worked from the get go for The Master Chief Collection.
attributes.description: A rap with all the Halo games to date was just as much of a blast making as it was playing all those games throughout the years. If only the online worked from the get go for The Master Chief Collection.
attributes.display_title: Halo Master Chief Collection Rap - "Back in the Ring"

attributes.title: Halo 5 Rap - "Angel by Your Side"
attributes.caption: What's the most compelling thing about Halo? Master Chief and Cortana, right? This song explores that relationship and more. Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: What's the most compelling thing about Halo? Master Chief and Cortana, right? This song explores that relationship and more. Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.

attributes.title: Master Chief vs Locke Rap Battle
attributes.caption: The Chief vs Locke thing fell a bit flat in the actual game so we decided to make up for what Halo 5's story lacked with this rap battle. Thank you to THK for their verses and mastering expertise.
attributes.description: The Chief vs Locke thing fell a bit flat in the actual game so we decided to make up for what Halo 5's story lacked with this rap battle. Thank you to THK for their verses and mastering expertise.
attributes.display_title: Master Chief vs Locke Rap Battle

attributes.title: Halo Infinite Rap - "Give Up on the World"
attributes.caption: We're back to our roots with a Halo Rap. We hope to make many more Halo Infinite songs this year!
attributes.description: We're back to our roots with a Halo Rap. We hope to make many more Halo Infinite songs this year!
attributes.display_title: Halo Infinite Rap - "Give Up on the World"
